meanings.definition: The study of the physical features of the earth and its atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: In geography class, we learn about mountains, rivers, and oceans.
meanings.sent2: Geography helps us understand the different landforms on Earth.
meanings.sent3: The geography of my messy room is quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her face was a map of geography, with valleys and peaks.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the geography of the Grand Canyon was an unforgettable experience.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of features of any complex entity.
meanings.sent1: The geography of the city includes its buildings, parks, and roads.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the geography of a computer system is crucial for troubleshooting.
meanings.sent3: The geography of flavors in the ice cream shop is a delightful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a geography of thoughts, each leading to a different destination.
meanings.sent5: The geography of a jigsaw puzzle can be challenging to piece together.
